about_the_game:
A set allowing the player to receive 2 horses free of charge. These horses are the rivals, the Child of the Slopes, Mihono Bourbon, and the Black Assassin, Rice Shower.

●How to Use
① Confirm the application of the additional contents on the 1st week of January 1991.
② When applied, the following 2 racehorses will be transferred to the player free of charge to be used as their own racehorse.

Mihono Bourbon (Born 1989)
　Sire: Magnitude
　Dam: Katsumi Echo
Rice Shower (Born 1989)
　Sire: Real Shadai
　Dam: Lilac Point

●Caution
・If the following conditions appear in the game, these horses cannot be obtained.

　・The game was not started from 1991.
　・The additional contents were not applied by the 1st week of January 1991.

・ The 2 horses that can be received through this DLC will not be available unless this DLC is applied.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
